text: Massimiliano Neri (born 14 June 1977, in Naples, Italy) is an Italian model and media personality.Alla scoperta del Giappone con Massimiliano Neri: un viaggio lungo due settimane == Career == Neri entered the modeling industry as a professional in Milan in 1995. He has participated in events with the following designers Versace, Dolce & Gabbana, Iceberg and Levi Strauss & Co, in Milan, Sydney, Auckland, Tokyo, Miami, New York. In New Zealand he was given a place in TV commercial for Levi's. he also made a TV commercial for Versace's sunglasses, which was shown in all over Europe. == References == Category:Living people Category:1977 births Category:Italian models Category:People from Naples Category:People from Milan
title: Massimiliano Neri
